verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5197>drop<s%> thy word <S%H413>toward<s%> the holy <S%H4720>places,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> thee, and will draw <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of his <S%H4480>sheath,<s%> <S%H8593><s%> and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

Seeing <S%H3282>then<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H4480>sheath<s%> <S%H8593><s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> from the <S%H4480>south<s%> <S%H5045><s%> to the north: <S%H6828><s%>

That <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have drawn <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of his <S%H4480>sheath:<s%> <S%H8593><s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

Sigh <S%H584><s%> therefore, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> with the <S%H7670>breaking<s%> of thy <S%H4975>loins;<s%> and with <S%H4814>bitterness<s%> <S%H584>sigh<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H5921>Wherefore<s%> <S%H4100><s%> <S%H584>sighest<s%> <S%H859>thou?<s%> that thou shalt <S%H559>answer,<s%> <S%H413>For<s%> the <S%H8052>tidings;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it <S%H935>cometh:<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H4549>melt,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H3543>faint,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1290>knees<s%> shall be <S%H1980>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it <S%H935>cometh,<s%> and shall be brought to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>LORD;<s%> <S%H559>Say,<s%> A <S%H2719>sword,<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2300>sharpened,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> furbished: <S%H4803><s%>

It is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> make a sore <S%H2873>slaughter;<s%> <S%H2874><s%> it is <S%H4803>furbished<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> it may <S%H1961>glitter:<s%> <S%H1300><s%> should we <S%H176>then<s%> make <S%H7797>mirth?<s%> it <S%H3988>contemneth<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of my <S%H1121>son,<s%> as <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree.<s%>

And he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> it to be <S%H4803>furbished,<s%> that it may be <S%H8610>handled:<s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2300>sharpened,<s%> and <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H4803>furbished,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2026>slayer.<s%>

Cry <S%H2199><s%> and <S%H3213>howl,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> upon my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall be upon <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H4048>terrors<s%> by reason <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H854>upon<s%> my <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H5606>smite<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thy <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> it is a <S%H974>trial,<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the sword <S%H3988>contemn<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> the <S%H7626>rod?<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> therefore, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and smite thine hands <S%H5221>together,<s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3709><s%> and let the <S%H2719>sword<s%> be <S%H3717>doubled<s%> the third <S%H7992>time,<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> men that are <S%H2491>slain,<s%> which entereth into their privy <S%H2314>chambers.<s%>

I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H19>point<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> may <S%H4127>faint,<s%> and their <S%H4383>ruins<s%> be <S%H7235>multiplied:<s%> <S%H253>ah!<s%> it is made <S%H6213>bright,<s%> <S%H1300><s%> it is wrapped <S%H4593>up<s%> for the <S%H2874>slaughter.<s%>
Go thee one way or <S%H258>other,<s%> either on the right <S%H3231>hand,<s%> or on the <S%H8041>left,<s%> <S%H575>whithersoever<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H3259>set.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> mine hands <S%H3709>together,<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3709><s%> and I will cause my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H5117>rest:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>said<s%> it.
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me again, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Also, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>appoint<s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> that the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> may <S%H935>come:<s%> both <S%H8147>twain<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of one <S%H4480>land:<s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H259><s%> and <S%H1254>choose<s%> thou a <S%H3027>place,<s%> <S%H1254>choose<s%> it at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Appoint <S%H7760><s%> a <S%H1870>way,<s%> that the <S%H2719>sword<s%> may <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbath<s%> of the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5983><s%> and <S%H854>to<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H1219>defensed.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H517>parting<s%> of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H7080>use<s%> <S%H7081>divination:<s%> he made his arrows <S%H7043>bright,<s%> <S%H2671><s%> he <S%H7592>consulted<s%> with <S%H8655>images,<s%> he <S%H7200>looked<s%> in the <S%H3516>liver.<s%>

At his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> the <S%H7081>divination<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H7760>appoint<s%> <S%H3733>captains,<s%> to <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H7524>slaughter,<s%> to lift <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting,<s%> to <S%H7760>appoint<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> to <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mount,<s%> and to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1785>fort.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto them as a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>divination<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> to them that have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H7621>oaths:<s%> but <S%H1931>he<s%> will call to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> that they may be <S%H8610>taken.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> ye have made your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered,<s%> in that your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H1540>discovered,<s%> so that in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5949>doings<s%> your <S%H2403>sins<s%> do <S%H7200>appear;<s%> <S%H3282>because,<s%> I say, that ye are come to <S%H2142>remembrance,<s%> ye shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> with the <S%H3709>hand.<s%>

And <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H2491>profane<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall have an <S%H7093>end,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H5493>Remove<s%> the <S%H4701>diadem,<s%> and take <S%H7311>off<s%> the <S%H5850>crown:<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be the <S%H2063>same:<s%> <S%H1361>exalt<s%> him that is <S%H8217>low,<s%> and <S%H8213>abase<s%> him that is <S%H1364>high.<s%>

I <S%H7760>will<s%> <S%H5754>overturn,<s%> <S%H5754>overturn,<s%> <S%H5754>overturn,<s%> it: <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H2063>it<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more, <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4941>right<s%> it is; and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it him.

And <S%H859>thou,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5983><s%> and <S%H413>concerning<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> even <S%H559>say<s%> thou, The <S%H2719>sword,<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H6605>drawn:<s%> for the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> it is <S%H4803>furbished,<s%> to <S%H3557>consume<s%> because <S%H4616>of<s%> the glittering: <S%H1300><s%>

While they <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> unto thee, while they <S%H7080>divine<s%> a <S%H3577>lie<s%> unto thee, to <S%H5414>bring<s%> thee <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of them that are <S%H2491>slain,<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall have an <S%H7093>end.<s%>

Shall I cause it to <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H8593>sheath?<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> thou wast <S%H1254>created,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H4351>nativity.<s%>

And I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> mine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, I will <S%H6315>blow<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1197>brutish<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H2796>skillful<s%> to <S%H4889>destroy.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> for <S%H402>fuel<s%> to the <S%H784>fire;<s%> thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> thou shalt be <S%H3808>no<s%> more <S%H2142>remembered:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.
